1. This Order may be cited as the Health (Amendment) Act 2023 

(Commencement) Order 2023.

title: conferred on me by section 2(2) of the Health (Amendment) Act 2023 (No. 7
heading: 2. The 17th day of April 2023 is appointed as the day on which the Health
text_raw:
2. The 17th day of April 2023 is appointed as the day on which the Health 

(Amendment) Act 2023 (No.7 of 2023) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

6 April, 2023. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th April, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [165] 3

title: conferred on me by section 2(2) of the Health (Amendment) Act 2023 (No. 7
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order appoints the 17th of April 2023 as the day on which the Health 
(Amendment) Act 2023 will come into operation. Section 1 repeals Section 
53C of the Health Act 1970 and provides for removal of the existing charge for 
acute public in-patient services (€80 per day). Section 1 also revokes the 
Health (Acute In-Patient Charges) Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 213 of 2021). 

 
 
 
 
 4 [165]
